definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
cannon fire to hit a mosquito/to use a sledgehammer to crack a nut
lit. even a mosquito, though tiny, provides some nourishment (idiom)/fig. it's better than nothing
pinyin: wen2 zi5 zai4 xiao3 ye3 shi4 rou4

definition: (jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)

sentences.english: Reducing the risk of mosquito transmission.
Generally, WNV is spread by the bite of an infected mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，西尼罗河病毒是由受到感染的蚊子传播的。
蚊子滋生于不流动的池塘里。

sentences.english: Mosquitofish, freshwater fish with a taste for mosquito larvae, are highly social.
sentences.chinese: 食蚊鱼是淡水鱼，以蚊子幼虫为食，高度的群体化。

sentences.english: All because of something as tiny as a mosquito.
Malaria is spread by  mosquito bites.
sentences.chinese: 疟疾经由蚊子叮咬传播。

sentences.english: Make a paste from baking soda and water and apply directly to the mosquito bite.
sentences.chinese: 把发酵粉和水搅拌成糊状，直接涂在蚊子叮咬处。

sentences.english: Wait until a mosquito imbibe enough blood then punch a hole on its stomach by a needle.
sentences.chinese: 期望一只蚊子吸饱了血，在它肚子上用针扎一个洞。

sentences.english: West Nile virus is mainly transmitted to people through the bites of infected mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 西尼罗河病毒主要通过受感染蚊子的叮咬传播给人类。
季夏是蚊子肆虐的时候。

sentences.english: It is those people who are most likely to be bitten.
sentences.chinese: 那些就是最可能被蚊子叮的人。

sentences.english: The mosquitos are drumming around me.
sentences.chinese: 蚊子正在我周围嗡嗡乱叫。

sentences.english: The color of anti-mosquito device and issued light promote mosquitoes fly to the main direction collectively.
sentences.chinese: 灭蚊器的色与发出的光，促使蚊子集体飞向主体方向。
蚊子和老鼠来拜访他们。

sentences.english: But at a dinner-party one would rather be a mosquito than a mute.
sentences.chinese: 但在晚宴席上，人们宁愿做一只蚊子也不愿沉默寡言。

sentences.english: All doors and windows are sealed for the extermination of mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 为了消灭蚊子，所有的门窗都被封闭起来了。
